amendment.description: Amendment prohibits the use of funds to lease or purchase new light-duty vehicles unless such a purchase is made in accordance with the President's memorandum.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 6 printed in the Congressional Record to prohibit the use of funds to lease or purchase new light duty vehicles for any executive fleet, or for an agency's fleet inventory, except in accordance with Presidential Memorandum.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Engel amendment (A061) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Engel amendment (A061) Agreed to by voice vote.
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A061) offered by Mr. Engel.
